thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Saturday, 10 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Belaruskali potash production unaffected after mine accident

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Belaruskali potash production unaffected after mine accident
text:
MINSK (Reuters) - Potash production at Belarusian miner Belaruskali, the worldâ€™s top exporter of the fertilizer ingredient, was unaffected after a mine accident late on Friday, deputy chief executive Anatoly Makhlai told Reuters.
Two miners were missing after the accident at the Belaruskali mine, the Belarusian emergency ministry said in a statement on Saturday.
According to the statement, the accident involved a rock slide and a burst of methane. The rescue operation was continuing, the ministry said.
Reporting by Andrey Makhovsky; Writing by Katya Golubkova; Editing by Dale Hudson
